sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, (@RN:=@RN+1)+rnum-1 as TOTAL_ROWS FROM ( SELECT a.*, @RN:=@RN+1 AS rnum FROM (
SELECT a.BBS_ID as bbsId, a.BBS_TY_CODE as bbsTyCode, b.CODE_NM as bbsTyCodeNm, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE as bbsAttrbCode, c.ATTRB_NM as bbsAttrbCodeNm, a.BBS_NM as bbsNm, a.USE_AT as useAt, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as frstRegisterPnttm, TABLE_NM as tableNm, PREV_NEXT_POSBL_AT as preNextPosblAt, CMMNT_POSBL_AT as cmmntPosblAt FROM TB_BBS_MASTR a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM TC_CMMNCODE_DETAIL WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATTRBINFO c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.ATTRB_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.USE_AT = #useAt#
a.BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',trim(#searchWrd#), '%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',trim(#searchWrd#), '%')
a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #bbsAttrbCode#
ORDER BY frstRegisterPnttm DESC
) a ORDER BY frstRegisterPnttm DESC ) a ORDER BY frstRegisterPnttm DESC ) a limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(a.BBS_ID) FROM TB_BBS_MASTR a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM TC_CMMNCODE_DETAIL WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATTRBINFO c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.ATTRB_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND a.USE_AT = #useAt#
a.BBS_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',trim(#searchWrd#), '%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',trim(#searchWrd#), '%')
a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = #bbsAttrbCode#

SELECT a.BBS_ID as bbsId, a.BBS_TY_CODE as bbsTyCode, b.CODE_NM as bbsTyCodeNm, a.BBS_INTRCN as bbsIntrcn, a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE as bbsAttrbCode, c.ATTRB_NM as bbsAttrbCodeNm, a.BBS_NM as bbsNm, a.FILE_ATCH_POSBL_AT as fileAtchPosblAt, a.POSBL_ATCH_FILE_NUMBER as atchPosblFileNumber, a.POSBL_ATCH_FILE_SIZE as posblAtchFileSize, a.REPLY_POSBL_AT as replyPosblAt, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId, a.USE_AT as useAt, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as frstRegisterPnttm, a.NTCE_BGNDE as ntceBgnde, a.NTCE_ENDDE as ntceEndde, ADIT_CNTNTS as addCon, a.TABLE_NM as tableNm, PREV_NEXT_POSBL_AT as preNextPosblAt, CMMNT_POSBL_AT as cmmntPosblAt,PAGE_UNIT as pageUnit, PAGE_SIZE as pageSize FROM TB_BBS_MASTR a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM TC_CMMNCODE_DETAIL WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM004' AND USE_AT='Y') b ON a.BBS_TY_CODE = b.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATTRBINFO c ON a.BBS_ATTRB_CODE = c.ATTRB_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TC_TMPLATINFO d ON a.TMPLAT_ID = d.TMPLAT_ID WHERE a.BBS_ID = #bbsId#
